tool_description: Advanced patent data search and topic analysis leveraging NLP
name: PatentEye
title: PatentEye

api_list.name: Get Patents - Authors
api_list.description: Get existing patents for a given Author based on Author Id

api_list.name: Get IPC
api_list.description: Get IPC information for a specific IPC class based on IPC code

api_list.name: Search Organizations
api_list.description: Search for Organizations based on the presence of keywords in the Organization Name

api_list.name: Semantic Search - Abstract
api_list.description: Use query based semantic search of claims to retrieve interesting patents. The response will contain the Patent Id and the respective Abstract for the top n_examples most relevant results.

api_list.name: Search IPC
api_list.description: Search for an existing IPC code based on the presence of specific keywords in the Name

api_list.name: Get Topics - Over time
api_list.description: Get the frequency of existing topics over a time window.

api_list.name: Topic Search - Keywords
api_list.description: Search existing topics based on the presence of keywords

api_list.name: Get Topics
api_list.description: Get existing topics or specific topic information based on Topic Id. The response contains a list of topics with the respective frequency and keywords.

api_list.name: Get Topics - Subclass
api_list.description: Get existing topics per IPC Subclass based on Subclass Name

api_list.name: Get Topics - Class
api_list.description: Get existing topics per IPC Class based on Class Name

api_list.name: Get Topics - Organization
api_list.description: Get existing topics for an Organization based on Organization Id

api_list.name: Semantic Search  - Claims
api_list.description: Use query based semantic search of claims to retrieve interesting patents. The response will contain the Patent Id and the respective Claims for the top n_examples most relevant results.

api_list.name: Get Patent Abstract
api_list.description: Get Abstract for a patent based on Patent Id

api_list.name: Get Patent Claims
api_list.description: Get patent Claims based on Patent Id

api_list.name: Get Topics - Section
api_list.description: Get existing topics per IPC Section based on Section Name

api_list.name: Keyword Search - Abstract
api_list.description: Search for patents based on the presence of keywords in the Abstract.

api_list.name: Keyword Search - Title
api_list.description: Search for patents based on the presence of keywords in the Title.

api_list.name: Get Patents
api_list.description: Get patent(s) information based on Patent Id or Topic Id

api_list.name: Keyword Search - Claims
api_list.description: Search for patents based on the presence of keywords in the Claims.

api_list.name: Get Patents - Organization
api_list.description: Get existing patents for a given Organization based on Organization Id

api_list.name: Get Organizations
api_list.description: Get all existing Organizations. Any Organization with <100 patents is re-labeled as "Individual".
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://patenteye.p.rapidapi.com/organizations/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "patenteye.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Authors
api_list.description: Get all existing Authors

api_list.name: Search Authors
api_list.description: Search for Authors based on the presence of keywords in the Author Name
